Recent updates from New York City include warnings about inflation refund check scams, ongoing investigations into subway groping incidents, and a tragic hit-and-run that killed a cyclist. Additionally, a NYC teen has been charged with murder, and the FDNY is probing hazing allegations involving new recruits.

### Emergencies & Risks

New York City faces a series of alarming incidents, including violent crimes and safety concerns.

- New Yorkers are warned about scams related to inflation refund checks.
